Sidebar {.sidebar}
----------------------------------------------

``` {r}
#Inputs
checkboxGroupInput(inputId = "Cereal_brand",
                   label = h4("Cereal Brands"),
                   choices = c("Wheaties", "Cinnamon Toast Crunch", "Kix"),
                   selected = c("Wheaties", "Cinnamon Toast Crunch", "Kix"))

selectInput(inputId = "ChooseVar",
            label = h4("Select Variable"),
            choices = c(sales, price),
            selected = vars[[1]])

sliderInput(inputId = "ci",
            label = h4("Select Confidence Interval"),
            min = 0.5,
            max = 0.95,
            value = 0.95,
            step = 0.05,
            pre = "%")
```

```{r}
# Reset Button
actionButton(inputId = "reset",
             label = "Reset",
             icon = icon("sync"))

observeEvent(eventExpr = input$reset, handlerExpr = {
  
  updateCheckboxGroupInput(session = session,
                           inputId = "Cereal_brand",
                           selected = c("Wheaties", "Cinnamon Toast Crunch", "Kix"))
  
  updateSelectInput(session = session,
                    inputId = "ChooseVar",
                    selected = vars[[1]])
  
  updateSliderInput(session = session,
                    inputId = "ci",
                    value = .95)
})
```

Column {data-width = 750}
----------------------------------------------

```{r}
# Reactive Filter
sales_tbl_filtered <- reactive({
  sales_tbl %>%
    filter(description %in% input$Cereal_brand)
})

boxplot_filtered <- reactive({
  sales_tbl[, c(input$ChooseVar)]
})
```

### Section - Reactive Output

```{r}
# renderTable(sales_tbl_filtered())
output$dt_output_1 <- DT::renderDataTable(expr = {
  sales_tbl_filtered() %>%
    mutate(price = scales::dollar(price))
}, options = list(scrollY = "250px"))

DTOutput(outputId = "dt_output_1")

# renderTable(boxplot_filtered())
output$dt_output_2 <- DT::renderDataTable(expr = {
  boxplot_filtered() %>%
    mutate(price = scales::dollar(price))
}, options = list(scrollY = "250px"))

DTOutput(outputId = "dt_output_2")
```
